publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2449 Mr Murray Tosh: Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committeesâ€”That the Parliament notes that the convenerships and vice-convenerships of the Parliament's committees were allocated initially on a proportional basis; agrees that these posts should always be allocated proportionally; recognises that the Labour Party, with 42.6% of the seats in the Parliament, now holds 53% of the committee convenerships and 47% of the vice-convenerships, and calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to take the initiative in restoring proportionality following any personnel changes arising from a reshuffle of Scottish Executive ministers.
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Phil Gallie*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, John Scott*

S1M-2449 Mr Murray Tosh: Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees-That the Parliament notes that the convenerships and vice-convenerships of the Parliament's committees were allocated initially on a proportional basis; agrees that these posts should always be allocated proportionally; recognises that the Labour Party, with 42.6% of the seats in the Parliament, now holds 53% of the committee convenerships and 47% of the vice-convenerships, and calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to take the initiative in restoring proportionality following any personnel changes arising from a reshuffle of Scottish Executive ministers. Supported by: Phil Gallie, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mr Mike Rumbles, John Scott, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mary Scanlon*, Fergus Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Irene McGugan*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Nora Radcliffe*, Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Morgan*, Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Kay Ullrich*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Ian Jenkins*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2449 Convenerships and vice-convenerships of committees (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
